title: How do I reroll champion shards in the new client?
body: I've clicked on the champion shards but nothing happens just a scroll-over picture of their splash art.

replies.body: Just close and open again the client.
That's weird!  You should be able to right click to open a drop down menu of options, which includes Re-rolling.  Give that a go, and let me know if this is still an issue.
